title: Magnetic Field Uniformity and Ultracold Neutron Storage Optimization for CryoEDM
abstractText: See Sussex EPP 2012 Consolidated Grant Application.
impactText: Findings have been used to help plan next generation neutron EDM research, which hope to discover clues to the origin of matter in the universe.
findingsText: We have found that ultracold neutrons (neutrons moving a few meters per second) can be stored for 10 minutes or more at cryogenic temperatures in a specially prepared acrylic box. Findings from this research will help lead to an improved neutron EDM measurement by the SNS and PSI nEDM collaborations. Other
